Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-22466 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-22466 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.2.0.azl0-1. This CVE either no longer is or was never applicable.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is installed with version 3.1.0-11 or earlier
